known_issues: Selecting Mantra 48 does not display its content (expected: content renders when Mantra 48 is selected).
Mantra dropdown previously did not show mantra numbers 47 and 48 for Sama Veda (intermittent/unclear current status).

existing_features.title: Ensure that when a user selects Samaveda Mantra 48 from the mantra dropdown, the app renders the mantra content section (metadata, text, and meaning) instead of showing an empty/no-content state.

If a selected mantra has no stored mantra text/meaning/metadata (all are null) but a saved template exists for that Veda + mantra number, display the saved template content in a read-only preview area within the mantra content section.
